Text:
Thanks so much for your feedback, Krispp.

It's strange that I haven't had anyone mention this yet. I removed the ISO from my HD a few weeks ago.

I'm really surprised poweriso doesn't open it, that was the app I used to make the image. When it was on my drive, I had no issue using winrar (although for some reason I usually had to open in winrar's file menu or drag and drop rather than click on the file itself).

Has anyone else had issues with opening the ISO?
Could someone please seed? There are a bunch of us stuck at 99,9% :(
This can be mounted with daemon tools even though it's not 100% complete... I guess we need to live with it unless a kind soul pops up.
